金句:
For 普通分手
分手之後，應該忘記就要忘記! 調整好自己既心情，讓自己早日得到解脫。
放低真係要完完全全去靠自己，時間係最好既方法。
咩承諾呀乜乜柒柒 當一個人唔再鐘意你 要同你分手既話，呢啲所有一切既野都係廢。
你都識講係你自己做得唔好啦 仲想人地番黎你身邊 害死人呀你
你咪當今次拍拖比你學到唔同既野囉 下次咪唔好重覆你上次拍拖個陣做既錯事囉

For 被出軌
唔明點解啲人要出軌
細水長流唔好咩，變左親人咁唔好咩
點解硬係要做一啲嘢黎傷害果個陪左你咁耐嘅人
新鮮感係會有，但知道開始有呢種感覺都好應該避忌啦
點解唔係去避忌
要一直玩火
有幾多人明白新鮮感總會淡 又有幾多人明白感情係要維繫而唔係一唔開心就換個第二個？
正所謂係鐘意佢嘅，又點會要佢傷心

He's a relationship expert whose work elaborates the keys to a successful long term relationship. I was reluctant to read it at first as I'm not an avid reader but it turned out to be worth my while since I've learnt loads about how men and women think differently. Many successful couples say this international bestseller is worth its weight in gold. For what it's worth you can also consult a social worker.

replies.msg: 幾年未有都未出聲

Last month my friend Paul married Clara, his girlfriend from Tinder. They were married by a pastor at Rosewood hotel, K-11 Musea. I said "Wishing you a lifetime of love and happiness!" My elder brother wrote "Best wishes on this wonderful journey as you build your new lives together!" My younger brother wrote "Thank you for letting us share in this joyful day! We wish you all the best as you embark on this wonderful union!" My sister wrote "Congratulations on finding each other! Your greatest adventure has just begun!" My cousin said "Wishing you fulfillment of every dream!" Paup honours his parents. He's thankful for what his parents have done for him. His sister is also a good daughter while his brother needs to be a better son. In the wast teachers and parents stress the importance of filial piety which means Chinese parental respect. Recently Paul's cousin stole his Chanel watchstrap. It was a question of honour to tell him about it. My brother too was honour bound to tell him. Paul's dad is a man of honour and great integrity. Both of us are kickboxing fans. In February Fred will be fighting chris for the heavyweight title for the honour if his country. Winning the championship is a matter of family honour, national honour and personal honour. Last week Fred's church held a feast in honour of him. Paul asked whether I would do him the honour of accompanying him to the feast which I did. It was a great honour to meet fred. Fred said humbly too "it's a signal honour to have you here Paul" We asked him if he would do us the honour of becoming our sambo coach. He said "I'll have to see" A couple of waiters did the honours and greeted the guests at the door. After we sat down Fred asked a waitress "Will you do the honours and cut us a piece of chicken?" Fred said "I would be honoured if you would come and see my fight in February." We gave him an affirmative response. Last year dana said to Fred "I would be honoured if you attended the hall of fame ceremony" which he did. He was honoured for his performance in his last fight. Besides winning the championship he was honoured with an award for excellence in grappling. By the way many people bought front row tickets for the next kickboxing event at half price or less due to a computer error but the organisation stated that they would honour these tickets nonetheless which could cost a million dollars in lost earnings.

觀自在菩薩。行深波若波羅蜜多時。照見五蘊皆空。

度一切苦厄。舍利子。色不異空。空不異色。

色即是空。空即是色。受想行識。亦復如是。

舍利子。是諸法空相。不生不滅。不垢不淨。

不增不減。是故空中無色。無受想行識。

無眼耳鼻舌身意。無色身香味觸法。

無眼界。乃至無意識界。

無無明。亦無無明盡。乃至無老死。亦無老死盡。

無苦集滅道。無智。亦無得。以無所得得故。

菩提薩埵。依般若波羅蜜多故。心無罣礙。

無罣礙故。遠離顛倒夢想。究竟涅盤。

三世諸佛。依波若波羅蜜多故。

得阿藐多羅三藐三菩提。故知般若波羅蜜多。

是大神咒。是大明咒。是無上咒。

是無等等咒。能除一切苦。真實不虛。

故說波若波羅蜜多咒。即說咒曰。

揭諦揭諦。波羅揭諦。波羅僧揭諦。菩提薩婆訶。
